title: IVR-Based Science Education Design: Applying Design-Based Research Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Core science education theory and experimental design experience
context.additional_context: A course where preservice teachers practice educational design using IVR (Immersive Virtual Reality) in science classes, with customized design for corporate training professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can design 360-degree video scenarios in an IVR environment to effectively convey scientific concepts.
Learners can validate the feasibility of IVR educational tools by applying design-based research methodologies.
Learners can implement science experiment simulations using smartphone-based IVR technology.
Learners can collect and incorporate feedback to improve instructional design based on IVR learning experiences.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
